title: Piadina Biologica
typeOfFood: Lacto, Italian, Organic, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a vegan organic piadina which is a cross between a crepe and a quesadilla. Also inside you can find organic products from Il Mio Casale (an organic food brand and also name of a restaurant). Located in the city center close to San Francesco Church.
